reviewText: Excellent audio tool for memorizing the KJV Bible. Thank you for providing it.
Absolutely the best help for audio review of verses.  The deep sonorous voice of the reader is clear and concise.  We enjoy our verse learning by audio Bible Memory  Very worth the price!

no where in advertising this purchase did it say 'will not play on apple computer'.  that's all I have and for what I need to do, it is too big a task to ask others to download copy and send to me the bible verse by verse - so for me....this was a very unproductive purchase.
I will use it while driving on my delivery route, after add verse ref to eact verse, so i add them to my IPod

Every verse is it's own mp3 file in KJV; that's an amazing feat.  you can create your own playlist of the verses you need to memorize and review, rather than listening to a whole chapter waiting for your verse to come up.  Every book is it's own folder as well as each chapter therein. Very organized data CD.
